works.description: One of the highlights from the Sotheby’s upcoming auction of Latin American Masterpieces is a locket-size self-portrait by Mexican artist Frida Kahlo, which is expected to sell for as much as $1.2 million. The self-portrait in miniature (or the Autorretrato en Miniatura) was earlier sold for $225,750 in 2000. At a mere 2 inches by 1-5/8 inches, this portrait is Kahlo’s smallest work, which depicts her youthful and serene wearing chandelier-like earrings. Sotheby’s Latin American head Carmen Melian said…
